Paragraph: Low-band-gap polymers for bulk - heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) have been studied intensively with the aim of matching a greater part of the solar spectrum and thus harvesting more photon flux , to produce efficiencies greater than 7-9 % .

Let's think step by step.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Low-band-gap polymers for bulk - heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) have been studied intensively with the aim of matching a greater part of the solar spectrum and thus harvesting more photon flux , to produce efficiencies greater than 7-9 % .

Let's think step by step.

1. "a greater part of the solar spectrum" - This phrase refers to the range of wavelengths that make up sunlight. It is not a "Property Value" entity.
2. "more photon flux" - Photon flux refers to the amount of light energy that is falling on a surface per unit area per unit time. It is a "Property Value" entity.
3. "efficiencies greater than 7-9 %" - This phrase refers to the effectiveness of the solar cells in converting sunlight into electricity. It is a "Property Value" entity.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "more photon flux" and "efficiencies greater than 7-9 %".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "more photon flux" - This phrase refers to the amount of light energy that is falling on a surface per unit area per unit time. It is a "Property Value" entity that clearly refers to the value of a material property.
2. "efficiencies greater than 7-9 %" - This phrase refers to the effectiveness of the solar cells in converting sunlight into electricity. It is a "Property Value" entity that clearly refers to the value of a material property.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the value of a material property are "more photon flux" and "efficiencies greater than 7-9 %".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| more photon flux |
| efficiencies greater than 7-9 % |
